description: REFUSE T1. Ash - Reduce height and crown spread by 3m.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: CONSENT T.1 Ash - Reduce the low branch by 5m to a suitable upright growth point. Remove small/weak branches in the upper crown. Remove dead branches.
